name: Cult Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner mystic! Generate the perfect, oh-so-alluring cult name that'll have followers flocking to your banner. Because every good cult needs a *really* good name.
introduction: Ready to lead the enlightened masses? Or maybe just throw a really weird party? Either way, our Cult Name Generator is here to help! We'll conjure up names that are equal parts intriguing, unsettling, and unforgettable. Get ready to inspire devotion... or at least a raised eyebrow or two.
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. We'll handle the dark arts...err, name generation.
Feeling picky? Click again! We've got more cult names than you can shake a ceremonial dagger at.
Found the *perfect* name? Copy it and start printing those recruitment flyers! (Responsibly, of course... mostly.)
If you're feeling extra creative, tweak the generated name to make it even more *you*. After all, you're the leader!

faqs.question: Is this generator actually summoning dark forces?
faqs.answer: Only dark forces of creativity! We promise no actual demons will be unleashed... unless that's your thing. We don't judge.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for something other than a cult?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Use them for your band, your book, your pet hamster... the possibilities are as endless as the void itself.

faqs.question: Are the generated names copyrighted?
faqs.answer: Nope! They're free for you to use and abuse as you see fit. Go forth and conquer... the naming world!

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the names?
faqs.answer: Keep clicking! We've got a vast library of prefixes and suffixes. Eventually, you'll find the name that speaks to your soul... or at least amuses you greatly.

faqs.question: Will using one of these names guarantee me a devoted following?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee total world domination (sorry!), a great name is definitely a good start! The rest is up to you... and your charisma (or lack thereof).

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes and suffixes for the generator?
faqs.answer: We'd love to hear your ideas! Send them our way, and we'll consider adding them to the mix. The more, the merrier (and the creepier)!
